text:
Avenue "C" 17th Street, to 16th East side. (Before reconstruction).
 January 26, 1919.

East River, shoreline, north from East 17th (left) to East 19th Streets, showing the Moore and McCormack pier at the foot of East 18th Street (no number) and barges docked off Marginal Street, between East 18th and East 19th Streets. Also shown (extreme left) is the central motors repair shop of the Department of Plants and Structures on the east side of Ave. C from East 16th to East 17th Streets.

August 31, 1926.

P. L. Sperr.
title: East River - Shore and skyline of lower Manhattan - South Ferry - Williamsburg Bridge - [Moore and McCormick piers.]
